p: We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer (100% Remote) to help build distributed systems in AWS/GCP Cloud and deploy ML Models into production.
p.3: We power the evolution of TV brand advertising by targeting TV viewers with unprecedented accuracy to maximize segmentation and reach. We look at age, gender, income, region in which people live and how each type of advertisement effects each type of person, and then find the best target audience for you to reach out to to maximize your ROI no matter what TV device or service the consumer is using.
p.6: As the Machine Learning Engineer you will collaborate directly with Researchers/Scientists and engineering to productize research as business software. Your work is leveraged by other engineers and by senior executives to define the future of the company. You will build MLOps Pipelines and deploy ML Models as Micro-services leveraged inside of business software products. You will design, train and apply statistics, mathematical models, and machine learning techniques to create scalable solutions for predictive learning, forecasting and optimization. You will work with product team to align software goals with KPI=E2=80=99s via empirical measures of effectiveness.
p.24: 401k- 50% match up to 6%. Fully vested after 3 years.
p.28: In this role you get to work on a TV Advertising platform that was built with purpose as the world evolves around television. Join us & apply now!
